about_the_game:
Dangerous creatures have made their way here! This is the SPACEUM space base and I need to get out of here urgently! The shuttle will pick me up, so I need to activate the code and enter the access code to board! To find out the code, turn on 1) Green 2) Red 3) Blue and 4) Yellow - the levers in the correct sequence! Find each of them and send the code through the input console or try to put down the alien to get the spare transmitter he has - look for weapons and ammo. You will be saved!

SPACEUM IS:

  • Realistic graphics, cut scenes, atmospheric sound design

  • Two ways to complete the game with different elements of the gameplay

  • During the game you will immerse yourself in the atmosphere of science fiction horror films about space

  • Random - the game starts from different points, quest places and items, and also a random alien from 4 types

  • This is an indie horror, with elements of stealth, shooter, horror, survival puzzles.

Dangerous creatures have made their way here! This is the SPACEUM space base and I need to get out of here urgently! The shuttle will pick me up, so I need to activate the code and enter the access code to board! Find each of them and send the code through the input console or try to put down the alien to get the spare transmitter he has - look for weapons and ammo. You will be saved!

name: SPACEUM

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R9 270
  • Storage: 7 GB GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 12 GB GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 590
  • Storage: 7 GB GB available space

short_description: You're stranded on SPACEUM, a sprawling space base with a deadly alien parasite hiding in the shadows. To escape, you’ll need every ounce of energy you can find. Can you crack the code to freedom, or will you face down the monster that stands in your way? How far will you go to make it out alive?
